name: threejs-texture-tool
description: Tool to preview and list your canvas or picture texture to three.js

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run css:dev & npm run js:dev
scripts.build: npm run css:build & npm run js:build
scripts.js:build: browserify -t [babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 ] ] src/index.js -o dist/canvasTextureTool.js && uglifyjs dist/canvasTextureTool.js -o dist/canvasTextureTool.min.js

author: Jérémie Boulay <jeremi.boulay@gmail.com>
